text: Caroline Veyre (born October 4, 1988) is an amateur boxer from Canada. She won a gold medal in the women's lightweight category at the 2015 Pan American Championships. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian women boxers Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Canada Category:Boxers at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Sportspeople from Montreal Category:Sportspeople from Paris Category:Pan American Games medalists in boxing Category:Boxers at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Canada Category:Light-welterweight boxers
title: Caroline Veyre
